column25: Think of a Product Detail Page as your product’s passport. Every platform—Google, TikTok, Meta—reads that passport before letting shoppers through. But passports expire. Prices change, schema breaks, reviews go missing. When that happens, rich results disappear and AI search ignores you. The fix? Treat the PDP as living data. Sync content from your PIM, regenerate JSON-LD every edit, and monitor errors daily. Tools like EKOM automate the rinse-and-repeat so your products stay visible everywhere—no rewrites, no surprises.
